title: New Orleans Jazz National Historical Park: Park Home
body: Experience Jazz Music Where it all Began  Only in New Orleans could there be a National Park for jazz! Drop by our visitor center at the Old U.S. Mint to inquire about musical events around town. In the mood for a world class musical experience? Attend a jazz concert or ranger performance at the new state of the art performance venue on the 3rd floor of the Old U.S. Mint. Read More               Jazz History & Musicians   Who invented jazz? Where was it born? Discover jazz through biographies, oral histories, and self-guided tours.        Jazz for Young Musicians & Listeners   Discover jazz through special kids' programs, the park's Junior Ranger program, and more!
